name: end_to_end_capture_and_act
title: End-to-end capture and action
description: Plan a safe workflow: inspect, pick coordinates, click, and verify the result.

content.text: Goal: {{goal}}. 1) Capture context with `take_screenshot(detect_elements=True)` (use output_dir={{output_dir}} if provided). 2) Identify the control described by {{target_hint}}, selecting precise percentage coordinates (use `convert_screenshot_coordinates` if starting from screenshot pixels). 3) Provide the exact `click_screen` call (prefer element_id or percentage coordinates) and flag any risks. 4) Recommend a quick verification capture after the action.
